name: ANS | [GRC/LEGAL] - Disclosure of subcontracted PII processing
description: The provisions of the agreements entered into between the provider and its customer must specify any recourse to the subcontracting of personal data processing. Thus, the provider must not use a subcontractor without having first informed the customer.
testingInformation:
Subcontracting the processing of PII must be documented and made available.
A procedure has been defined and implemented to inform the end customer in the event of a change.
actionPlanInstructions: Define a list of subcontractors and a procedure to handle changes of subcontractors.
actionPlanTitle: Subcontracting entities not properly defined and repertoriated.
